```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggforce)
geom_circle()

```


3 streger - major
hver under indelt med en mellem
som er underinddelt med 1 minor

På begge leder

1,2,3

```{r}
n <- 3
cirkler <- function(n = 3, seed = NULL) {
  set.seed(seed)
  z <- seq(1, 3, 0.25)
  x0 <- sample(z, n)
  y0 <- sample(z, n)
  r <- 0.5
  df <- tibble(x0 = x0, y0 = y0, r = r)
  
  ggforce::geom_circle(
    data = df,
    mapping = aes(x0 = x0, y0 = y0, r = r),
    color = "red",
    fill = NA,
    inherit.aes = FALSE
  )
}
```


```{r}
seq(1,3,0.25)


expand.grid(x = seq(1,3,0.25), y = seq(1,3,0.25)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x,y)) +
  geom_point()  +
  cirkler()
  stat_circle(aes(x0 = 2, y0 = 2, r = 0.25))

```



```{r}
expand.grid(x = seq(1,3,0.25), y = seq(1,3,0.25)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  cirkler(n = 5)
```
